item.title: Is Success Luck or Hard Work?
item.author: blog@albert-rapp.de (Albert Rapp)
item.description: Recently, I decided to try out a few stretches in an effort to stay in shape during long stretches of working from home and not leaving the house. Also, to distract me from my inflexible body I thought I would watch a video on YouTube simultaneously and as luck would have it, I saw an interesting video on Veritasium’s YouTube Channel called “Is Success Luck or Hard Work”. Personally, I agree with a lot of things being said in that video and I recommend that you check out the video if you want to get a perspective on the role of luck compared to skill (or keep on reading for my own take on this topic).
item.dc:creator: Albert Rapp
